snippet: Executives from OppenheimerFunds and Franklin Advisers wrote to senior officials in Puerto Rico, warning of “years of economic turmoil” because of the decision to default.
lead_paragraph: Executives from OppenheimerFunds and Franklin Advisers wrote to senior officials in Puerto Rico, warning of “years of economic turmoil” because of the decision to default.

headline.main: Two Large Puerto Rico Bondholders Demand Full Payment
headline.print_headline: 2 Mutual Fund Companies Demand Full Payment on Puerto Rican Bonds in Default
